alert.note: Alert for Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Northern Outer Banks; Tyrrell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 8:34PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Hyde, Dare and Tyrrell Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 834 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Old Trap to near Fairfield. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kill Devil Hills, Stumpy Point, Southern Shores, Killkenny, Manns Harbor, Nags Head, Alligator, Gum Neck, Kilkenny, Fairfield, Mashoes, Manteo, East Lake, Colington, Whalebone, Newfoundland, Fort Landing, Frying Pan Landing, Buffalo City and Alligator Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Northern Outer Banks; Tyrrell
